guide_title.message: How to Set Up Built-in Gemini Nano in Chrome with QuickSum

troubleshoot_detail.message: If the "Optimization Guide On Device Model" is not displayed, disable the settings in steps 2 and 3, ensure you have at least 22GB free on your disk, restart your browser, and re-enable it.
